ing: 1 pinch red pepper flakes, or to taste
des: "This refreshing cucumber salad, made with lime juice and cilantro, is quick and easy to make and is great alongside steak or tacos."
ins: Mix cucumber, cilantro, lime juice, garlic, sambal oelek, red pepper flakes and salt together in a bowl until evenly combined; allow to sit until flavors blend, at least 10 minutes.
